verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah (3)
We have a strong city.
CHORUS:
Open ye gates that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth
May enter in, may enter in.(2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace
Whose mind is stayed on Thee (3)
Because he trusteth in Thee.
